summary: In 1940, the Nazis invade Britain and transform it into a fascist state where some Britons collaborate and others resist. In 1944, an apolitical Irish nurse becomes a reluctant player in the fight between the two sides.
cast: Pauline Murray|Sebastian Shaw|Bart Allison|Reginald Marsh|Frank Bennett|Derek Milburn|Nicolette Bernard|Nicholas Moore|Rex Collett|Michael Passmore|Peter Dyneley|Barrie Pattison|Honor Fearson|Ronald Phillips|Frank Gardner|Bertha Russell|Miles Halliwell|Chris Slaughter|Carole James|Pat Sullivan|Pat Kearney|Bill Thomas|Stella Kemball|Ralph Wilson|Fiona Leland|Alfred Ziemen|Graham Adam|Claire Allen|Christopher Bell|Percy Binns|Bruce Burn|Brewster Cross|Jeremy Dacon|Norbert Dingeldein|Peter Elkins|Richard Golding|Jefferson Grieves|John Herrington|Benjamin Hodgetts|Jim Joslyn|Karl Heinz Kreiseler|Fritz Kule|Alvar Liddell|Jim Linwood|Susan Lionnel|Werner Mall√©|Gustav Mekke|Michael Mellinger|Andrew Mollo|Anthony L. title: It Happened Here
